atk-s0401a3:1_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame abhāvitanti avaḍḍhitaṁ bhāvanāvasena appavattitaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:1_2: Akammaniyaṁ hotīti kammakkhamaṁ kammayoggaṁ na hoti.
atk-s0401a3:1_4: Ettha ca paṭhame cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:1_5: dutiye vivaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ. Tattha ca vaṭṭaṁ vaṭṭapādaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:1_6: vivaṭṭaṁ vivaṭṭapādanti ayaṁ pabhedo veditabbo. Vaṭṭaṁ nāma tebhūmakavaṭṭaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:2_2: Mahato anatthāya saṁvattatīti devamanussasampattiyo mārabrahmaissariyāni ca dadamānampi punappunaṁ jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāse khandhadhātuāyatanapaṭiccasamuppādavaṭṭāni ca dadamānaṁ kevalaṁ dukkhakkhandhameva detīti mahato anatthāya saṁvattati nāmāti.
atk-s0401a3:3_2: Tatrāmayadhippāyo – vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ nāma uppannampi abhāvitaṁ apātubhūtameva hoti. Kasmā ?
atk-s0401a3:3_4: Vivaṭṭavasena uppannaṁ pana bhāvitaṁ pātubhūtaṁ nāma hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0401a3:5_1: Navame ‘‘jātipi dukkhā’’tiādinā nayena vuttaṁ dukkhaṁ adhivahati āharatīti dukkhādhivahaṁ. Dukkhādhivāhantipi pāṭho.
atk-s0401a3:5_2: Tassattho – lokuttarapādakajjhānādi ariyadhammābhimukhaṁ dukkhena adhivāhīyati pesīyatīti dukkhādhivāhaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:5_4: Tañhi vuttappakārā devamanussādisampattiyo dadamānampi jātiādīnaṁ adhivahanato dukkhādhivahaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:6_5: phalasukhato nibbānasukhaṁ adhivahati āharatīti sukhādhivahaṁ nāma hoti, sukhādhivāhaṁ vā.
atk-s0401a3:6_6: Tañhi lokuttarapādakajjhānādiariyadhammābhimukhaṁ supesayaṁ vissaṭṭhaindavajirasadisaṁ hotīti sukhādhivāhantipi vuccati.
